reviewText: I am one of those people that love sappy endings. I also love it when the good guys win, when the underdogs triumph, and when people are reminded that God does indeed exist--even if at times it all feels like hocus pocus. But, I am also one of those people who likes good acting and sadly, there are many Christian films that lack good actors. That, however, is not the case when it comes to Touched By An Angel--regardless of the season you choose to watch. The episodes are heart-wrenching, and they remind you that there really is a God out there waiting with loving arms to comfort you.

Touched by an Angel is a must for anyone's home library. The episodes are encouraging and uplifting. Every week the cast was able to make you believe that God does care and will make a difference in your life. Also each episode has a biblically theme lesson that we all can learn from and apply in our lives. I highly recommend this excellent product
Loved it been looking for these for a long time

I love my Touched By An Angel series.  I am buying these season by season as they go on sale and I am so happy I did because they have been keeping me company since I got injured recently.  This season 4 is nicely packaged inside plastic DVD holders and then placed inside the box which is somewhat sturdy.  Highly recommend!

Yup The wife wanted this  for her B'day.  She got it and watched them.  No problems with the DVD's OK.

The fourth season copes with vast variety of situations. There is no difference of gender, race or religion. As a Jewish woman I found a new perspective of our morning prayers in the episode Jones Vs. God. The prayer of Shema Israel was emphasized in Elijah. Some of the episodes were extremely moving. But I've changed my point of view about dealing with evil: I was inspired to change my attitude towards vicious people in my life. I recommend purchasing the fourth season of Touched By An Angel because it deals with difficult problems and presents sins that usually people think that are unredeemed; however, the angels always comfort the people and bring them a message of hope and the love of God.
EXCELLENT ... this is closed captioned and is excellent family programing and we need more quality programs such as this series.
it tells about god and how god works through people and also how angels help people and sometimes save them from disaster
I have enjoy watching these DVDs .  I can't wait for season 5 coming to my house so that I can watch them over the weekend.
I continue to watch and be comforted by the peace they try to convey.  Just take it in and feel the love.

This series were a triumph to common sense ethics in human behavior.
Excellently written, acted and directed. I wish it would have continued for 10 more years.
I love it. It's so different. I wish all people could watch it. It's good for family, for everybody. I enjoy to watch this angels: Tess and Monica doing their job.
As always, the series has thought provoking episodes.  It seems like there is a message for all of us that God loves us.
I enjoy it very much. I think its great, hope there will be more volumes in the future months to come.

Having been a fan of Touched By An Angel when it was in its original run, I was very pleased to see all my favorite episodes in DVD. This season was a great reminder of a truly wonderful cast and many inspirational stories of hope and faith. I hope to buy more seasons as they are available.

It is a great way to wind down on a Saturday or Sunday night.  Too bad they took such a high quality show of the TV and replaced it with garbage!  Buy this DVD collection and share it with your family.  You will be blessed and so will they.

This season of Touched by an Angel is wonderful as are the other seasons which I love so much.  I can't wait till Season 5 comes out which I'm really waiting to see and hear from you soon and all the other season further on.  Please let me know as soon as possible when they will be out. Can't wait.  I'm really sorry about hearing the death of John Dye.  He was one of my favorites on the show, not to say that I love Tess and Monica and all the others.  I wish I could learn more about John Dye and what is was doing before his death and about his family.  Your faithful customer Susan Goldin.  Thanks again.

If you haven't seen Touched by an Angel before, then I recommend not only the fourth season, but all seasons. This season has some of the best episodes in the series. It's a must have for family movie people and especially christians. It's a series that is sure to touch the hearts of millions.

Other tv shows are being pumped out in record time while TBAA is held back. I've looked at the pages of reviews here and have to believe there is a huge market for the show. I have the first four seasons and would like to purchase all the rest of the seasons. Where are they? Amazon doesn't even have a pre-order set up for season five...which makes me wonder if we have seen the last of this great series. I hope not, but it's looking that way. Having the seasons split in half is a pain, but not having them at all will be even worse. Please, folks, for once do the right thing; put the last seven seasons out!
